title: Gather Requirements
description: Collect and document requirements for the DynamicSummaryDashboard project, including data sources, metrics, stakeholders, and desired functionality.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data pipelines, data storage, application components, and their interactions. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.

title: Implement Data Ingestion
description: Develop mechanisms to collect and ingest data from various sources into the system.

title: Set up Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for storing and querying ingested data.

title: Develop Dashboard Frontend
description: Build the user interface and frontend components for the dynamic summary dashboard.

title: Implement Backend Logic
description: Develop the backend logic for processing data, generating summaries, and serving data to the frontend.

title: Set up Continuous Integration/Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project, including architecture diagrams, user guides, and developer documentation.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the system.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
